description:
This insulated, waterproof-breathable jacket is built for wetter weather.
Thermal-reflective lining warms you up by retaining your body heat while maintaining peak breathability.
Find a just-right fit with adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem.
name: Columbia Sportswear Hikebound Insulated Jacket - Big - Mens
